modelelement.name: sdmetricsbase
modelelement.attribute: Owner of the element in the UML model.
Unique identifier of the model element.
Name of the element in UML model.
The stereotypes of the model element.

modelelement.name: class
modelelement.attribute: Visibility of the class (public, private, protected, package).
Boolean indicating if class is abstract.
Boolean indicating if a class must not have subclasses.

modelelement.name: attribute
modelelement.attribute: Visibility of the attribute (public, private, protected, package).
Reference to the attribute type (class, data type etc).
Changeability of the attribute (changeable or none, frozen, addOnly).

modelelement.name: operation
modelelement.attribute: Visibility of the operation (public, private, protected, package).
Boolean indicating if operation is abstract.
Boolean indicating if operation is a query that does not change the classifier's state.

modelelement.name: parameter
modelelement.attribute: The kind of parameter (in, out, inout, return).
Reference to the parameter type (class, data type etc).

modelelement.name: associationend
modelelement.attribute: Boolean indicating if the association end is navigable.
Indicates if the association end is an aggregation or composite.
A link to the element attached to the association end.

modelelement.name: generalization
modelelement.attribute: Link to the child in the generalization.
Link to the parent in the generalization.

modelelement.name: abstraction
modelelement.attribute: Link to the interface.
Link to the element implementing the interface

modelelement.name: dependency
modelelement.attribute: Link to the supplier of the dependency.
Link to the client of the dependency.

modelelement.name: usage
modelelement.attribute: Link to the supplier of the usage.
Link to the client of the usage.

modelelement.name: object
modelelement.attribute: Link to the element of which this object is an instance.

modelelement.name: stimulus
modelelement.attribute: Sender of the stimulus.
Receiver of the stimulus.
The action that the stimulus dispatches.

modelelement.name: linkend
modelelement.attribute: The element that is attached to the link end.

modelelement.name: classifierrole
modelelement.attribute: The classifier which the classifier role is a view of.

modelelement.name: message
modelelement.attribute: The sender of the message.
The receiver of the message.
The action that the message dispatches.

modelelement.name: sdmetricsabstractstate
modelelement.attribute: The entry actions of the state.
The exit actions of the state.
The do actions of the state.
The internal transitions of the state.

modelelement.name: state
modelelement.attribute: The kind of state (simple, composite, submachine, stub, synch, final; initial, deepHistory, shallowHistory, join, fork, choice or branch, junction; action, objectflow, call, subactivity).
Indicates if a composite state is concurrent.

modelelement.name: transition
modelelement.attribute: The source state of the transition.
The target state of the transition.
The event that triggers the transition.

modelelement.name: event
modelelement.attribute: The kind of event (signal, call, change, time).
The element (signal, operation, boolean expression, or deadline) that raised the event.

modelelement.name: action
modelelement.attribute: The kind of action (send, return, create, destroy, call, terminate, uninterpreted).
Depending on the kind of action, the operation or signal that is invoked when the action is executed, or the classifier of which an instance is created.

modelelement.name: partition
modelelement.attribute: The elements contained in the swimlane.

modelelement.name: usecaseextend
modelelement.attribute: The use case that is extended.
The use case that is the extension.
The extension point in the extended use case.

modelelement.name: usecaseinclude
modelelement.attribute: The including use case.
The included use case.

modelelement.name: component
modelelement.attribute: The node on which the component is deployed.

modelelement.name: componentinstance
modelelement.attribute: The component that is instantiated.

modelelement.name: nodeinstance
modelelement.attribute: The node that is instantiated.

modelelement.name: stereotype
modelelement.attribute: The set of elements that the stereotype extends.

modelelement.name: taggedvalue
modelelement.attribute: The tag of the tagged value (up to UML 1.3)
Definition of the tagged value (since UML 1.4)
The value of the tagged value.

modelelement.name: tagdefinition
modelelement.attribute: The tag name of a tagged value's tag.

modelelement.name: diagram
modelelement.attribute: The type of diagram (class diagram, sequence diagram, etc).

modelelement.name: diagramelement
modelelement.attribute: The element that is shown on the diagram.
